reviews.review_msg: Enda is great. He breaks things down so they're easily digestible, introduces current topics and connects them to the topics we study, and he's a good teacher! HOWEVER why in a 400 level course is a very large part of my grade dependent on a group project? I feel like it should be more about what you know rather than how well you work with others.

probably one of the best professors in the communication department at SFU. dedicated, friendly, helpful, everything you've probably ever wanted in a professor is right here. i took 130 with him as well and i highly recommend. participation is very very important!
